page.title: 07A farmer's day.
page.content: Roger is a fairly small scale farmer with a dairy herd of 50 cows. His day starts at 0630 when he goes to milk the cows. He then feeds the calves before having breakfast at about 0830. { In summer}his mornings will often be spent cutting hay or silage while he will spend his afternoons shaking and leading hay.{At harvest time} he will start combining at about 11 when the grain has dried out and he will carry on until evening.{In winter}he will spend the mornings stockfeeding while the afternoons will be occupied in routine maintenance.Afternoon milking takes place from 4 to 5 30. Roger is involved in a variety of outside activities and his evenings can be spent at parish council meetings or at NFU meetings.Like many farmers, he enjoys playing bowls. He is also a very keen video cameraman.
